environmentNote: Set BASE_URL to your API origin before running these commands (example: export BASE_URL=http://localhost:5000).

endpoints.name: Health Check
endpoints.description: Check backend service status.

endpoints.name: Root Welcome
endpoints.description: Fetch API welcome message and metadata.

endpoints.name: Customer Signup
endpoints.description: Register a new customer account.

endpoints.name: Customer Verify OTP
endpoints.description: Verify the OTP sent to a customer email during signup.

endpoints.name: Customer Login
endpoints.description: Authenticate a customer and receive a JWT.

endpoints.name: Customer Resend OTP
endpoints.description: Request a new OTP for a customer signup verification.

endpoints.name: Vendor Signup
endpoints.description: Register a new vendor account.
endpoints.curl: curl -X POST "$BASE_URL/api/auth/vendor/signup" -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"businessName":"Sample Store","businessEmail":"store@example.com","businessPhone":"+1234567890","businessWebsite":"https://samplestore.com","businessAddress":"123 Market Street","city":"Lusaka","state":"Lusaka Province","country":"Zambia","postalCode":"10101","businessType":"Retail","description":"We sell great products.","categories":["electronics","fashion"],"password":"StrongPass123!","agreeToTerms":true,"agreeToVendorTerms":true}'

endpoints.name: Vendor Verify OTP
endpoints.description: Verify the OTP sent to a vendor email during signup.

endpoints.name: Vendor Login
endpoints.description: Authenticate a vendor and receive a JWT.

endpoints.name: Vendor Resend OTP
endpoints.description: Request a new OTP for a vendor signup verification.

endpoints.name: Current User Profile
endpoints.description: Retrieve profile details for the authenticated user (customer or vendor).

endpoints.name: Email Registration Status
endpoints.description: Check if an email is already registered and under which role.

endpoints.name: Start Google OAuth
endpoints.description: Initiate Google OAuth flow (open in browser or follow redirects).

endpoints.name: Google OAuth Callback
endpoints.description: Handle Google OAuth callback with provider code and state parameters.

endpoints.name: Verify Google ID Token
endpoints.description: Exchange a Google ID token for a session in the marketplace.

endpoints.name: Get Customer Profile
endpoints.description: Fetch the authenticated customer's profile.

endpoints.name: Update Customer Profile
endpoints.description: Update customer profile details or password.

endpoints.name: List Customer Orders
endpoints.description: Retrieve paginated orders for the authenticated customer.

endpoints.name: Place Customer Orders
endpoints.description: Convert the customer cart into one or more vendor orders with shipping details.
endpoints.curl: curl -X POST "$BASE_URL/api/customer/orders" -H 'Authorization: Bearer <JWT_TOKEN>' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"paymentMethod":"cod","saveAddressToProfile":true,"shippingAddress":{"fullName":"Jane Doe","email":"jane@example.com","phone":"+260700000000","street1":"123 Market Avenue","city":"Lusaka","state":"Lusaka Province","postalCode":"10101","country":"Zambia"}}'

endpoints.name: Get Order Details
endpoints.description: Retrieve details for a specific order.

endpoints.name: List Wishlist Items
endpoints.description: Fetch wishlist items for the authenticated customer.

endpoints.name: Add Wishlist Item
endpoints.description: Add a product to the customer's wishlist.

endpoints.name: Remove Wishlist Item
endpoints.description: Remove a product from the customer's wishlist.

endpoints.name: Delete Customer Account
endpoints.description: Permanently delete the authenticated customer's account.

endpoints.name: Fix Registration Method
endpoints.description: Repair registration metadata for accounts migrated from Google sign-in.

endpoints.name: Get Cart
endpoints.description: Retrieve cart items for the authenticated customer.

endpoints.name: Add Cart Item
endpoints.description: Add a product to the cart or increase quantity if it already exists.

endpoints.name: Update Cart Item
endpoints.description: Update the quantity of a specific cart item.

endpoints.name: Remove Cart Item
endpoints.description: Remove an item from the cart.

endpoints.name: Clear Cart
endpoints.description: Remove all items from the customer's cart.

endpoints.name: List Products
endpoints.description: Retrieve all public products with optional filters.

endpoints.name: List Vendors
endpoints.description: List vendors that have published products.

endpoints.name: Get Vendor Catalogue
endpoints.description: Retrieve products for a specific vendor.

endpoints.name: List Featured Products
endpoints.description: Fetch featured or highlighted products.

endpoints.name: Get Product Details
endpoints.description: Retrieve the details of a single product.

endpoints.name: Upload Vendor Profile Photo
endpoints.description: Upload or update the vendor profile photo using a base64 payload.

endpoints.name: Upload Product Image
endpoints.description: Upload a product image in base64 format and attach it to a product.

endpoints.name: Get Vendor Profile
endpoints.description: Retrieve the authenticated vendor's profile.

endpoints.name: Update Vendor Profile
endpoints.description: Update vendor business information.
endpoints.curl: curl -X PUT "$BASE_URL/api/vendor/profile" -H 'Authorization: Bearer <JWT_TOKEN>' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"businessPhone":"+1234567890","businessWebsite":"https://samplestore.com","businessAddress":"123 Market Street","city":"Lusaka","state":"Lusaka Province","country":"Zambia","postalCode":"10101","description":"Updated description","categories":["electronics","fashion"],"supportEmail":"support@samplestore.com"}'

endpoints.name: Vendor Dashboard Metrics
endpoints.description: Fetch high-level dashboard metrics for the vendor.

endpoints.name: List Vendor Products
endpoints.description: List products owned by the authenticated vendor.

endpoints.name: Create Product
endpoints.description: Create a new product owned by the vendor.

endpoints.name: Update Product
endpoints.description: Update fields on an existing product owned by the vendor.

endpoints.name: Delete Product
endpoints.description: Delete a product owned by the vendor.

endpoints.name: List Vendor Orders
endpoints.description: Retrieve orders that include the vendor's products.

endpoints.name: Update Order Status
endpoints.description: Update status for an order handled by the vendor.

endpoints.name: Delete Vendor Account
endpoints.description: Permanently delete the authenticated vendor account.

endpoints.name: Admin Login
endpoints.description: Authenticate an admin user and receive a JWT.

endpoints.name: List Vendors
endpoints.description: Retrieve a paginated list of vendors for moderation.

endpoints.name: Get Vendor Details
endpoints.description: Fetch detailed information about a specific vendor.

endpoints.name: Approve Vendor
endpoints.description: Approve a vendor application.

endpoints.name: Reject Vendor
endpoints.description: Reject a vendor application with an optional reason.

endpoints.name: Admin Dashboard Metrics
endpoints.description: Fetch aggregate metrics for the admin dashboard.

endpoints.name: Update Vendor Profile
endpoints.description: Update vendor information as an admin.
endpoints.curl: curl -X PUT "$BASE_URL/api/admin/vendors/<VENDOR_ID>" -H 'Authorization: Bearer <ADMIN_JWT>' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"businessPhone":"+1234567890","businessAddress":"123 Market Street","approved":true}'

endpoints.name: Delete Vendor
endpoints.description: Remove a vendor record (and optionally notify them).

endpoints.name: List Products
endpoints.description: List products with moderation filters.

endpoints.name: Update Product
endpoints.description: Update product metadata as an admin.

endpoints.name: Delete Product
endpoints.description: Remove a product from the catalog.

endpoints.name: Toggle Product Red Mark
endpoints.description: Toggle the red-flag status on a product for review.
endpoints.curl: curl -X PUT "$BASE_URL/api/admin/products/<PRODUCT_ID>/red-mark" -H 'Authorization: Bearer <ADMIN_JWT>' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"redMarked":true,"reason":"Potential policy issue"}'

endpoints.name: List Customers
endpoints.description: Retrieve customer accounts with pagination.

endpoints.name: Get Customer Details
endpoints.description: View details of a specific customer account.

endpoints.name: Delete Customer
endpoints.description: Delete a customer account.
